title: EastEnders spoilers: Callum's big secret is revealed to Whitney tonight
text:
Leo King (Tom Wells) has been doing everything he can to get close to Whitney Dean in EastEnders as a means of seeking revenge — and tonight, he ups his game once more, as he attempts to remove the obstacle that is Callum ‘Halfway’ Highway (Tony Clay) from the equation once and for all.

Leo has been hellbent on getting close to Whitney over the last couple of months. Last week, he upped his game, as he almost got the young woman to open up about her past. However, his mission was sabotaged when Callum interrupted their date.

After it became rather clear that Whitney was still harbouring feelings for her ex, Leo knew that Callum was going to be a thorn in the side of his plans — something which was later confirmed when Whitney informed Leo that she’s not ready for a relationship just yet.

Earlier this week, the sick paralegal portrayed himself as Whitney’s hero when he helped her clean up her stall, but — once again — Callum came along and, like the hero that he is, helped in saving the day — much to Leo’s dismay.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Leo knows that he’s got no chance to get close to Whitney with watchful protector Callum on the scene, so tonight he sets about damaging the heroic image Whitney has of her ex.

He makes a surprising discovery, and proceeds to quiz Callum in The Queen Vic about his time in the army as a result. Later, Whitney and Lola (Danielle Harold) arrive, and Leo offers his help in tracking down the person who vandalised the stall.

While doing so, Whitney comes across a file on Leo’s laptop — one that has Callum’s name on it. She becomes curious, but she’s left devastated by what she stumbles upon.

Will Leo’s mission to dirty Callum’s name work successfully?

Will Whitney turn on Callum?

Or will she see through Leo’s games?

EastEnders continues Thursday 24thOctober at 7:30pm on BBC One.

MORE: EastEnders spoilers: A dark new storyline is revealed for Ben Mitchell as he takes revenge

MORE: EastEnders spoilers: Martin Fowler in serious danger — but will he die?

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Whitney's devastated by what she finds out about Callum after Leo's meddling.
